metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000121 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference exists in curl 7.21.0 to and including curl7.58.0 in the LDAP code that allows an attacker to cause a denial ofservice

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000121` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3
libcurl3-nss - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3
libcurl4 - 7.58.0-2ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.58.0-2ubuntu3').
